name: Unsanctified Shoulders
flavorText: “A demon hunter who fully tempers their hatred with discipline will see their vengeance clearly.” -Kovan the Merciless
flavorTextHtml: “A demon hunter who fully tempers their hatred with discipline will see their vengeance clearly.” -Kovan the Merciless

primary.textHtml: +[91 - 100] Resistance to All Elements

setDescription:
(2) Set:     
 Your generators generate 2 additional Hatred and 1 Discipline.(4) Set:     
 Gain 60% damage reduction and deal 60% increased damage for 8 seconds if no enemy is within 10 yards of you.(6) Set:     
 Your generators, Multishot, and Vengeance deal 350% increased damage for every point of Discipline you have.
setDescriptionHtml:
